operators.name: Mori the Piercer

abilities.text: Strike [1] After the strike, Mori must move downstream
Disintegrate a female operator with 2 defense or less
Move and Strike [2] if Mori already moved this turn

operators.special: Once Mori uses the move action he may Strike [1]
operators.flavortext: I live by a code. The code says nothing about time travel.

operators.name: Ben Storm

abilities.text: Strike [1] and push target downstream
Ambush: Strike [2] any operator that move into his turnpoint on opponent's next turn
Turn a human operator into a drone

operators.flavortext: You think my ambitions are twisted? You haven't met my twin sister.

operators.name: Angela Storm

abilities.text: Strike [1] and push target upstream
Take control of opponent's drone for 2 turns
Disable all male operators in her turnpoint

operators.flavortext: Ask me if this is the worst I can do. Please!

operators.name: Akane

abilities.text: Haven: Activate a disabled operator and give them +1 defense [until next turn]
Disable all male operators [until next turn]
Take opponent's operator under your control [until next turn]

operators.special: If Red Eye is in the same turnpoint with Mori, she must move away by the end of the turn, even if she has already moved.
operators.flavortext: Not like this' I asked, but he had two needs of me.

operators.name: Jerusalem

abilities.text: Disable an AI or drone operator [until next turn]
Mark & Destroy: Disintegrate an operator with 1 defense
Strike [4] to a hideout

operators.flavortext: You made me a false idol, but I became a true god.

operators.name: Samarkand

abilities.text: Lockdown: opponent's operators can't move in or out of Samarkand turnpoint
Break down into 3 Tamerlans
Send all operators on the board to their original stream and epoch

operators.special: Cannot move downstream. *For each disintegrated Tamerlan, Samarkand has 1 less defense on reintegration
operators.flavortext: 24 of us want to follow you, 7 disagree, and 3 want to kill you.

operators.name: Tamerlan

abilities.text: Strike [1]
Give another Tamerlan on the board +1 Strike [once per turn, until next turn]
Re-integrate Tamerlans back into Samarkand [all Tamerlans must be in the same turnpoint]

operators.special: Can move 2 times in a turn
operators.flavortext: We came. We saw. We conquered.

operators.name: The Pale Man

abilities.text: Strike [1] one century up or down-stream
Armor up: gain +2 defense
Strike [3]

operators.flavortext: I do not have higher functions.

operators.name: Mia Star

abilities.text: When moving, take an operator along. Does not count as a move action for that operator
Give +1 defense to all Orbital Strike operators on the board
Strike [2] 3 times

operators.flavortext: My mind is a star and my palms are solar sails.

operators.name: Augur, Stream Phase Shaman

abilities.text: Channel: switch Augur with any disintegrated operator. Switch back if disabled.
Phase-out: no ability can be used upon the target of this ability
Stream-shade: create a double that mirrors Augur's actions in another stream, always in the same century. [see FAQ]

operators.special: Pay (1x) to prolong Augur's ability for 1 turn
operators.flavortext: The dead call to me from the void between the streams. I feed the living to them.

operators.name: Kim-Li

abilities.text: Undo a strike action from opponent's previous turn.
Strike [2] across stream
Disintegrate an operator activated on opponent's previous turn

operators.special: Cannot be struck by female operators
operators.flavortext: I adore women, the pinnacle of their free will is slavery. All they need is the right master.

operators.name: Reclaimer

abilities.text: Strike [2]
Lockdown: no operator can move in or out of Reclaimer's turnpoint
Prevent spinning agenda [in its turnpoint]

operators.special: *Can be activated in any turnpoint but cannot move on it's own
operators.flavortext: Make room. Or don't.

operators.name: Disruptor

abilities.text: Prevents stream-step into its location
Prevents upstream movement into its location
Prevents downstream movement into its location

operators.flavortext: Access denied.

operators.name: Sourayah the Bad Prophet

abilities.text: Select a turnpoint upstream. A random* operator there gets +2 defense
Select a turnpoint upstream. A random* operator there gets -2 defense
Dark visions: choose a male operator upstream. During opponent's next turn that operator can't move and must use Strike ability on anyone he can.

operators.special: Cannot move upstream. *random: see rules FAQ
operators.flavortext: They all think they need me, freely willing to sacrifice so much. This is how my gift works.

operators.name: Aran

abilities.text: Strike [3]
Strike [2] to any operator that used an ability preventing them from being attacked
Move into turnpoint that is restricted by a movement-preventing ability

operators.flavortext: I am like the ham'sin: desert wind, dust, and pain.

operators.name: Sahar

abilities.text: Reactivate a disabled operator from Unit 707
Reactivate any disabled operator and take control of them [until next turn]
Reactivate all disabled operators in stream [until next turn]

operators.special: Can move 2 times in a turn
operators.flavortext: If the desert sand does not do it first, I will drink all your body fluids.

operators.name: Hamdi

abilities.text: Give +1 defense to an operator from Unit 707
Give +1 defense to any operator
Strike [3]

operators.flavortext: Blood sometimes gets mixed in my black coffee, I like the taste.

operators.name: Marwa

abilities.text: Move a unit 707 operator from current to any turnpoint
Recall: move all operators of unit 707 to her location
Disable all female operators in her turnpoint

operators.special: All members of unit 707 can be activated on the commander's location instead of their century
operators.flavortext: Some women thought I was too ugly to give commands.

operators.name: Dr. Koh

abilities.text: Permanently change the sex of an operator
Viral decay: all operators on the board get -1 defense
Bring back a disintegrated operator, put them in 2200

operators.flavortext: You see yourself as a whole, in form and mind, but you are not. Let me show you.

operators.name: Ben Storm

abilities.text: Make a turnpoint any type of agenda until end of your turn
Prevent an operator anywhere from moving [until next turn]
Undo an action from opponent's previous turn [once per turn]

operators.special: When activated, disable Ben and Angela Storm [until next turn]
operators.flavortext: Join me outside the box, dead and alive.

operators.name: Captain Shortspear

abilities.text: Strike [2]
Move. After moving can't be a target of any ability [until next turn]
Strike [2] at 2 targets

operators.flavortext: You won't pick me out in a crowd, not until my pistol is in your face.

operators.name: Soren Glasskin

abilities.text: Use an ability that any other other operator [in his turnpoint] may use [must pay it's price]
Use an ability that any other operator in the same stream may use [must pay its price]
Take control of an opponent's operator while opponent controls Soren for 2 turns

operators.flavortext: You keep calling me Soren, you really shouldn't.

operators.name: The Gray Baron

abilities.text: Strike [2]
Spin agenda instantly without ripple effect
Truce: make all friendly operators untouchable by any ability [until next turn]

operators.flavortext: Men of power cast dark shadows. The closer a woman gets, the easier for her to hide in them.

operators.name: Dr. Archangel

abilities.text: Disintegrate an operator disabled on this turn
Give Mr. Archangel +2 defense
Disable an operator [until next turn]

operators.flavortext: They never suspect.

operators.name: Mr. Archangel

abilities.text: Create a drone with Strike [1] (1m)/ 1 Defense
Augment: Give another operator +2 for their next Strike
EMP Strike: Disable all opponent's drones [in his turnpoint, until next turn]

operators.special: Can build up to 3 drones. Drones destroyed on any strike or when Mr. Archangel is disabled
operators.flavortext: If the devil grants you your wish, is he still the devil? Or do you become the devil by paying his price?

hideouts.name: SSV-93 Ural
hideouts.passive: Doubles the activated agenda [on Ural's turnpoint, once per turn]
hideouts.flavortext: Tovarisch Capitan, we're in range of their missiles Keep course, they won't see us in range of their fists!

hideouts.name: Zongshan
hideouts.passive: Turns activated agenda to any type [on Zongshan's turnpoint, once per turn]
hideouts.flavortext: Too many changes impede progress; we need silence.

hideouts.name: Avalon
hideouts.active: Move up/downstream. All operators and hideouts move along with Avalon
hideouts.passive: Can be activated as an agenda providing (1x)
hideouts.special: Phased-out: Positioned as if located in a third stream between the 2 players. [see FAQ]
hideouts.flavortext: One day this will be the busiest black market in our solar system; we need only to keep it hidden for a century.
